headline: Top Editor at BuzzFeed Will Become Media Columnist for The Times
abstract: Mr. Smith will leave the news organization where he has been editor in chief since 2012.
lead_paragraph: Ben Smith, the editor in chief of BuzzFeed, who built a hard-hitting news operation within a digital media organization better known for clickbait and listicles, will be The New York Timesâ€™s next media columnist.
